TopicTitle: Gemini 6A and 7 with a Real Live Mission Controllers [Experimental]

Articles.Content:
Hello and welcome to this *test* of the idea and the ability to make a realistic recreation of the Gemini 6A and 7 missions where we will have 2 real pilots flying side by side on DMP and have a live mission control crew that will monitor each flight as would the real MC team did.

Please note this is an experimental idea we will have to test it- BUT if it works we will release the above idea.

We will use the Telemachus: Web Telemetry and the Stand-alone Map Multi-monitor mod which will allow us to see their map screens while the pilots do as they are told by the MC team who will plot their manuvear nodes and take them to within meters of each other.

If you would like to see this let me know below and if you would like to JOIN us as a ground crew member let me know and we will see if the experiment allows for it so this (the final product) will be able to have you as a member

Members:

ZooNamedGames (Flight Director of 6A)

Mk3424

Current Testing Status:

Will begin testing this Saturday 3pm EST

Please note the real event may be a few days if not a week or more so please if you would like to help contact me and I can try to test along with you.

Current as of 12/23/14

Edited December 24, 2014 by ZooNamedGames
Current research for the event looks to be running smoothly- we *may* have a chance at this working but we'll see in testing.
Again- testing is planned for this Saturday.
